realistic tale of an economy in

for years and years lived off the
diminishing funds of a family

she has to do what no lady uh had ever
um uh had to do in her family that is
she has to work for a living hepsa has
decided that she must open a scent shop
a little 7-Eleven on the side of her

some gingerbread I think of hepsa a

they're hired for the Christmas rush
they were not suited to this business

she Quivers and Quavers through her
whole frame she's so
nervous that uh standing behind the

Sundries she's she's collected for

Rusty gown with her bony old buttocks in

for the marbles and uh uh and spools of
thread she's lost and so what one can
get from Hawthorne uh as from from no
other American writer is what it feels
like to have hit bottom helping us to

doesn't have any of the skills she needs
has no certainly has no sense of Client
Services doesn't really even understand

Hawthorne is hard-headed enough not to
pretend that old woman Heba is actually
going to be able to remake herself is
going to be able to enter this new
commercial economy in which she lives
but lucky for her uh her cousin arrives
and her cousin has marvelous ideas about
how if they just Brew up some ginger

sleeves up on our snowy white arms and
con and concoct that ginger beer that
they will be able to make this scent
shop a a goinging concern and what the
House of the Seven Gables uh tells us is
that uh an older generation's ways will
um will recede into the past and that
with luck a newer
generation's um initiative and energy
will uh will not only uh deliver Society

that Hawthorne uh is
describing um succession natural

Hawthorn's cleare eyed um

to
be older what it is to be older and
